name: Content Filter Engine
description: Pattern matching engine, schema validation, encoding detection, YAML-based pattern library, CLI and library interfaces. Foundation for all other features.

name: Audit Trail & Override
description: Append-only JSONL audit logging for all content operations, human override mechanism with accountability, log rotation.

name: Typed References & Provenance
description: TypedReference builder with immutable provenance metadata (origin, trust_level, content_hash, filter_result). Cross-process transfer format.

name: Dual-Context Sandboxing
description: CaMeL-inspired quarantined/privileged context separation via MCP profiles. Quarantine runner spawns isolated k sessions.

name: Integration & Canary Suite
description: PreToolUse hook integration, adversarial canary test payloads (injection, encoding, exfiltration, tool invocation, benign), end-to-end pipeline tests, red team validation.
